properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 10 at 2:15PM PST until February 11 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt and seas
around 9 feet at 17 seconds expected.

* WHERE...Waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR from 10 to 60
NM.

* WHEN...Until 1 AM PST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM PST TUESDAY
